title: Matt Mann and his swimming techniques
brief_description: The various techniques developed in USA by matt Mann for teaching groups pf boys to swim are demonstrated. The crawl, the backstroke, breast stoke, and butterfly, are separately illustrated, from the beginning land drills to the completed stroke in the water.
